title: 74/196. Observer status for the Group of Seven Plus in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/74/196
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
30 December 2019 
 
19-22405 (E)    090120 
*1922405* 
 
 
Seventy-fourth session 
Agenda item 171 
Observer status for the Group of Seven Plus in the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 18 December 2019 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/74/440)] 
 
 
 74/196. Observer status for the Group of Seven Plus 
in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Group of 
Seven Plus, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Group of Seven Plus to participate in the sessions 
and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
51st plenary meeting 
18 December 2019

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Group of Seven Plus to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
